page.title: 03AT LEISURE IN GLENLUCE
page.content: For adults there is{Bowling,Golf, {Badminton,Darts,Dominoes}and{Pool}also {W.R.I., Womens Guild,Young Womens {Group,Sewing Bee,Keep Fit}and{Floral {Art}.Being a rural community ,there is a {Young Farmers Group}.Children can join{Brownies,Guides, Cubs}and Badminton.Unfortunately, there is no Scout Group .Most of these are winter activities.Summer brings an annual event in the{Glenluce Games},now in its 110th year. A {Sports Queen}and two attendant princesses are chosen from the young girls of the village. The Annual Sports attract athletes from as far away as Fife, for the prize money offered is far in excess of that offered for any other games in the vicinity. The{School}is used as the central meeting place in the county for many organisations.
